website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this tinted, SPF moisturizer creamy and natural-looking, its oil-free formula is the one to choose for consumers with oily skin.
pros: A top brand in premium cosmetics and a formula that's suitable for oily skin, thanks to the oil-free formula that moisturizes and controls shine
Goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly
cons: Not the best formula for dry skin
Mixed reviews on the scent – some like
others find it a bit strong

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product but the oil free is pretty hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product but the oil free is pretty hard core. I need to mix it with a bit of lotion but that's ok cause it'll last longer. Perfect amount of coverage without feeling like a have a fake face, let's your natural skin show through while evening it out. I prefer the non oil free but they're all out of stock everywhere. This one a bit watered down is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Very Natuaral
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and will buy it again. I have very good skin to start with. I am very particular with what I put on it. Many tinted moisturizers are oily. This stays all day with a non-oily finish. It doesn’t wear off and looks completely natural.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wasserstrom

customer_reviews.title: Love it .. so why don’t I marry it
customer_reviews.text: The best .. love my perfect shade.. almond ... worn it for over 10 years . I try new and improved but come back to this every time . It’s not too light and not too heavy .. love love love it
customer_reviews.author: sandra deldon

customer_reviews.title: I've used it for years and absolutely love it, not only because it matches my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I got introduced to the product by my cousin who has flawless skin. I've used it for years and absolutely love it, not only because it matches my skin tone wonderfully but it also has a decent numbered SPF. I apply after using moisurizer in the morning and it stays all day. The only down side, being that my skin is very oily, on hot summer days I need to use much less or else I'll be very shiny/greasy. But again I have very oily skin, other than that I love this product and even use their powdered compact.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: ... moisturizer - it doesn't clog my pores and offers great coverage (with the help of spot concealer) without looking ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this tinted moisturizer - it doesn't clog my pores and offers great coverage (with the help of spot concealer) without looking cakey. It has no odor and the consistency of it makes it easy to spread on your face with your fingertips. I also like that it gives your skin a little bit of glow. If parts of your face are looking a little dark, blot with a piece of tissue or toilet paper and it smooths right out. It seems small, but my last tube has lasted me over a year with almost daily application.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL TINTED MOISTURIZER
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive to changing products, but there were no breakouts or other skin irritations using this product! It covers nicely, and makes my face look so smooth and silky. The tint is perfect - just enough to cover imperfections without looking like makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R.

customer_reviews.title: Let’s your skin show through!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that I couldn’t find Blush. This is a shade lighter but works too. Use this for everyday foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I'm running around and don't have time to put on a full face. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lady g

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: this is all I use- 30SPF would be even better
customer_reviews.author: Anita Wambaugh

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Gently covers the facial skin. pleasant Texture! not greasy texture . Great!
customer_reviews.author: Hila shamir

customer_reviews.title: Laura Mercier products are available
customer_reviews.text: Have use Laura Mercier products a long time glad to see that they have it
customer_reviews.author: Rita Adrian

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this to moisturize my skin. Works great at night
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Swann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Def protects you from the sun and feels good on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: I would like this item cancelled. Money returned. Package was empty
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how I liked it. The package was empty.
customer_reviews.author: Lawson M. Kerster

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended and I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended and I was skeptical. I used mineral powder for years. But, this looks dewey and goes on well. It is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderslam

customer_reviews.title: Better delivery the second time I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for several years and love it!
customer_reviews.author: helene gerstein

customer_reviews.title: Great light coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have dry / combination skin with some light lines and this really seems to work best for me. In the warmer months, I end up with a little too much shine, so I balance with a little loose powder. Laura Mercier's Oil-Free Tinted Moisturizer evens out my skin tone and leaves my skin feeling dewy. It will not cover blemishes very well since it is a lighter coverage, but I keep a Clinique concealer handy for those and just belnd in with the tinted moisturizer. I have been using this product for 8 years. 'Ive tried others and always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Turned orangey on my oily skin (oxidation). Felt sticky and heavy on, as if my skin couldn't breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice option for sunny days when you don't want heavy makeup.
customer_reviews.author: marnie elder

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I wear it every day. The coverage is light and even.
customer_reviews.author: Nutrition Student

customer_reviews.title: This tinted moisturizer gives me the perfect light weight coverage adding just a bit of that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin with freckles which gives my skin both pink and yellow undertones. This tinted moisturizer gives me the perfect light weight coverage adding just a bit of that sun glow! at the beginning it has given me a tiny bit of break out but that tends to hapen with any new products i use on my face. Bisque is the color I orderd!
customer_reviews.author: M. Elsbury

customer_reviews.title: best part of my morning regimen
customer_reviews.text: i have used this product for years now....best part of my morning regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product. I needed good coverage with a moisturizer ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I needed good coverage with a moisturizer that didn't make me break out. This one works better than other minimally tinted products I have use--not quite as full coverage as a foundation, but close to it. I usually mix this with my regular foundation for a great dewy look.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Cabot

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very pleasantly surprised by the quick shipping, received a week before estimated date! Thx!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. Perfect for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: Man I bought this for only $19 on here! It was a steal for the price it was worth. Even for $43 it would have been worth it. This stuff is amazing. Perfect for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Nwosu

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is okay; maybe I ordered the wrong shade. I use it anyway. Will order again in a different shade. Worked very will with my dark skin.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Thoms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer
customer_reviews.text: This tinted moisturizer has a light texture and good coverage. I purchased it for well below retail. It works great over a primer and I did not need to add any powder.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Carter

customer_reviews.title: best foundation ever!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend everone to try this foundation. It's very light and gives a natural finish. It arrived on time and in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: andrea londono

customer_reviews.title: One tube does it
customer_reviews.text: Tinted moisturizer with SPF making it great for travel. Non greasy but gives enough coverage for a sheer finish.
customer_reviews.author: luvboox

customer_reviews.title: Long time user
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Laur Mercier Tinted moisturizer daily for years. I have really oily skin. This product does not increase oil production or irritate/clog my skin. When I need a bit more coverage(as in going out for the evening), I combine it w Shesiedo tint moisturizer. I do not use powder or base.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love...Love...LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first Laura Mercier purchase. Read great reviews & they are so TRUE. I don't like wearing heavy foundation but wanted something to help with my dry skin areas on my face and give me just a little coverage. This is perfect!! It's pricey but the tube is big and you don't need much. So worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: shoppinmom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to return the product for a darker shade so I gave it away
customer_reviews.author: Milton G Draper

customer_reviews.title: Tinted Moisturizer Mocha
customer_reviews.text: This product is good as a alternative to foundation which I am not willing to wear and no shade to people who choose it This is the darkest shade that is sold so I am including my picture if you are a darker complexion this would not be the product to choose The product has 15 shades all which are lighter and only 3 that are for people of color There is another product called Black Radiance that is at a significantly lower pricepoint that may work in combination with excellent daily skincare
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My go-to moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of these so far. It works well. It is hard to get almond so was glad I could find this color here.
customer_reviews.author: Yin Yee

product_meta.title: Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Oil Free, Bisque
product_meta.description: Color:BisqueLaura's award-winning, Oil-Free, demi-matte multi-tasker is the key to a healthy, no-makeup look. Lightweight formula helps control oil breakthrough and adds a soft hint of color that evens and enhances skin without hiding it. Use in place of foundation for effortless sheer demi-matte coverage and visibly even complexion. Stays color-true; wears all day. Delivers advanced skin-caring benefits: Broad Spectrum SPF 20 UVB/UVA sunscreen plus a power-blend of antioxidant vitamins C and E help protect skin from the damaging effects of the environment.
feature_bullets: The sheer, lightweight moisturizer adds a hint of color that can be used in place of foundation for a natural appearance while adding a healthy glow to your complexion

To maintain a dewy finish: set Tinted Moisturizer with a small amount of Translucent Loose Powder using the Powder Brush; For a matte finish: set Tinted Moisturizer with Translucent Loose Powder using the Velour Puff
SPF 20 offers protection from the harmful, damaging rays of the sun
Extremely long-wearing - colour stays true and wears evenly even in humid climates
